title: Machine Design
description: The selection, analysis, and synthesis of springs, joining and fastening methods, bearings, shafts, gears, and other elements.  Design of assemblies. Computer-based methods.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (AE 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and ME 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and COE 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
